title: Caged Aminoluciferin Probe for Bioluminescent Immunoproteasome Activity Analysis

The immunoproteasome (iCP) can be expressed under inflammatory conditions, such as exposure to interferon-gamma (IFN-γ), that alerts the cell to begin generating iCP preferentially over the standard proteasome (sCP). With...
